meter_reading.notes: Odometer wheels read 02271.1 (2271.1 m³). The small red pointer is between the 0.03 and 0.04 marks on the circular dial. Following rule 4 to interpolate to 0.01 resolution, the needle is visibly closer to the 0.04 mark. The needle angle is calculated assuming 0 at 12 o'clock and 10 segments of 36 degrees each (4 segments * 36 degrees = 144 degrees).
